title: Airdrop
description: Airdrop is a term for marketing campaign launched by many ICOs in which they distributes their specific token to the general public.

props.body: It is usually initiated by the creator of a cryptocurrency in order to encourage the use and build the popularity of the coin or token. Most airdrop campaigns run with mechanics such as receiving coins or tokens in exchange for simple tasks like sharing news, referring friends, or downloading an app.
